content:
In about 25 minutes we have our every-two-weeks conference call: http://www.hl7.org/concalls/CallDetails.cfm?concall=55136

No agenda for today, but if anyone wants to join to get an update on the changes in the proposed ballot version of the IG, or discuss anything else, I'll be on the Zoom call.

We will likely put these calls on hiatus after today until the ballot closes Sept 13.
